SIGN_IN_COVER.TITLE: Welcome!
SIGN_IN_COVER.DESCRIPTION: Sign in if you already have an account or use the button below to register.

SIGN_UP_COVER.TITLE: New here?
SIGN_UP_COVER.DESCRIPTION: Register if you don't have an account yet or use the button below to log in.

400.TITLE: Bad Request
400.DESCRIPTION: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

403.TITLE: Forbidden
403.DESCRIPTION: You do not have permission to access this resource.

404.TITLE: Not Found
404.DESCRIPTION: The page you are looking for might have been removed had its name changed or is temporarily unavailable.

405.TITLE: Method Not Allowed
405.DESCRIPTION: The request method is not supported for the requested resource.

406.TITLE: Not Acceptable
406.DESCRIPTION: The requested resource is capable of generating only content not acceptable according to the Accept headers sent in the request.

422.TITLE: Unprocessable Entity
422.DESCRIPTION: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

500.TITLE: Internal Server Error
500.DESCRIPTION: The server encountered an unexpected condition.

502.TITLE: Bad Gateway
502.DESCRIPTION: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.

503.TITLE: Service Unavailable
503.DESCRIPTION: The server is not ready to handle the request.

504.TITLE: Gateway Timeout
504.DESCRIPTION: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.

DESCRIPTION.SUCCESS: The confirmation was successful. You can use the button below or wait for the redirection.
DESCRIPTION.FAILURE: The confirmation could not be completed. Please use the button below to try again.

SIGN_UP.EMAIL_VERIFICATION: Please confirm your registration via the link sent to your email

FORGOT.EMAIL_VERIFICATION: Please check your email for the reset link
